text: - At Village, we want to be famous
for great customer experiences,
not great infrastructure.
The skills we require
to manage our cloud infrastructure
are in high demand and short supply.
AWS Managed Services
has allowed our team to free up the focus
on what's really important, our customer.

The biggest benefit we've
seen with AWS Managed Services
is an automation.

Our patching and backups
used to be all manual,
and now it's fully automated.

AMS worked hand in hand with
our SAP application team

to migrate all of our SAP
footprint into the AWS cloud.
This is comprised of eight applications,

which gave us across 40
workloads running on 70 servers
with hundreds of terabytes of data
across hundreds of disk volumes.
This was all migrated in just one weekend.

We have strategic business
reviews on a monthly basis
with AWS Managed Services.

We focus on cost optimization,
security and resiliency.
AWS Managed Services

has helped us reduce our
workload costs by 22%,

helped us reduce our storage
costs by more than 9%,

and helped us improve our
security by more than 100%.
Building on AWS allowed Village Roadshow
to move quickly and scale efficiently.

We're able to move our
customer facing applications
into the cloud very quickly

and deliver better performance
to our end customers.
(upbeat music)
